name: Minlie Huang
content: Dr. Minlie Huang's Homepage About Publications Honors & Rewards Services Courses Talks Recruitment About Me My general interests include artificial intelligence, deep learning, and natural language processing. I am particularly interested in the following fields:Natural language generation theories, models & evaluationFundamental problems in large language models and multi-modal foundation models AI alignment, safety and ethicsSocial intelligence with large language models (emotion, theory-of-mind, mental health applications)I am leading a research group named Conversational AI (CoAI, GitHub link). This group published more than 100 papers on ACL, ICLR, ICML, Neurips conferences, and has won many paper awards including COLING 2010 best paper, ACL 2012 best student paper, IJCAI 2018 distinguished paper, SIGDIAL 2020 best paper, NLPCC 2015/2020 best paper, ACL 2023/2024 area chair award, etc. We have also highly cited works including emotional chatting machine (AAAI 2018), ESC (ACL 2021), PPT (ACL 2022), MiniLLM (ICLR 2024), ChatGLM (2024, with Prof. Jie Tang), etc.A full version of group introduction can be seen here.We also welcome talented undergraduates and interns to join us for doing interesting and amazing research. I also supervised and led many undergraduates to do research.
